title: TCS, Infosys, HCL Tech, Cognizant: Work from Home to End? Know What IT Companies Say - News18
content: TCS, Infosys, HCL Tech, Cognizant: Work from Home to End? Know What IT Companies Say  News18
description: TCS, Infosys, Cognizant and other IT companies are treading the cautious path when it comes to calling employees back to the office. Know how they are planning to open offices
